metadata.title: CVE-2018-18829 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: There exists a NULL pointer dereference in ff_vc1_parse_frame_header_adv invc1.c in Libav 12.3, which allows attackers to cause a denial-of-servicethrough a crafted aac file.

criterions.comment: qtwebengine-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
vlc package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
gst-libav1.0 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
